title: Can't connect to Games.
body:
I've tried restarting the launcher and my PC. I had no other programs open or anything as well. 

2 ranked losses now because of this and I get a timer penalty...

When I hit reconnect I instantly get told "something went wrong"

Please tell me how to fix this.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having problems specifically connecting to the game server.  You'll want to go through each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve whatever is causing that block to occur.  You should test it out in a custom game, though, to prevent anymore penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Open $RiotGames\League of Legends\config\Game.cfg 
There is a line that says WindowMode=x

Change it to WindowMode=1 and restart your client. I have to do that every time there's a patch, then I can change it to whatever window mode I want. basically the new client is kind of dumb - it just restarted automatically after I finished a game for no apparent reason. It feels like a beta product still.
